reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress cute with a flattering shape, comfortable without looking frumpy, and of nice quality. The fit and length receive mixed feedback - while some say it fits great and has a great length, others find it tight in the bust and too short. The material quality and sizing also get mixed reviews, with some praising the fabric while others describe it as terrible, and some noting it's not suitable for s

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Need in every color!
items.body: Super cute and comfortable! The bell sleeves add the perfect stylish touch and the relaxed fit makes it easy to wear all day. A great go-to dress for any season. Read more
items.author: Louise T

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality
items.body: Adorable and perfect material and fit Read more
items.author: Marisa martin

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lot's of compliments but a tad tight
items.body: This is a great little dress for a casual day. I planned on wearing it as part of an elf costume for Ren Fen and was going to use a PU leather corset, elf ears and tall boots to complete the look. The price is great, had tons of good reviews so I ordered it. I mean, it's a super cute dress on it's own and I would totally wear this to go out for lunch with friends or to any casual event, not just Ren Fen. Based on the Amazon suggested size for me I ordered a large (I'm in between a C cup and a D cup in bra size). It arrived quickly (my PU leather corset did not, sadly) and looked perfect. Well made, tight seems, great length. I ended up wearing it without my corset but the only thing that I had an issue with was the chest size. It was, still is a bit tight the chest. Tight enough that it's obvious that it does not fit and so for that reason it's been put in the costume bin and not a dress I would wear throughout the year. The arms fit great, the length was perfect - just above the knee - not too short, not too long. I still like the dress and end up wearing it with a super tight sports bra and an infinity scarf to hide the tight chest. I suggest ordering a size up if you have above average size breasts (I'm in between a C and D cup bra size). Read more
items.author: Dianna P

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not flattering on me
items.body: I have a dress similar to this in black. That dress is a sheer chiffon over a black liner. It's cute and flattering. I was hoping this dress would be similar. Alas, it's not. The material feels cheap and rough to my hands. Although it's a chiffon-like material, it's not sheer. And it is not lined. So we have a dress that's unrelenting brown and white polka dots. The color was fine but I wanted it to be sheer with the liner. It fit ok in the arms and length but the chest was a bit tight. I returned it because it just wasn't right for me. Read more
items.author: NOLAReviewrGrl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress- need it in all the colors!
items.body: I love this dress! Great colors and cute design. The cut is super flattering and the length is short but cute and flirty. Great fabric weight- does not feel cheap. Very comfortable too- I wear with boy shorts underneath to avoid a Marilyn Monroe moment. I have received a ton of compliments in this! Read more
items.author: Leslie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and fit
items.body: I normally do not have a lot of success ordering clothes on Amazon so when I loved this dress I thought I’d write a review! I’m normally between and large and extra large, I like my clothes to fit a little loose so I tend to get XL. But I went with the large on this and the fit was perfect. The quality of the dress was much better and thicker than I expected too! I’m 5’7” and the length was perfect too. It was a tad tight in the shoulders when I tried to take the dress off but it didn’t feel tight when I was wearing it. I’m going to buy this in another color too because I like it so much! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Zero stretch, order up if your chest measurement is close, or it will trap you for eternity.
items.body: I ordered based on the size chart and went with a medium. I could get it on, but I knew once I got it over my chest and shoulders it wasn't going to work. I think broad wide shoulders were more of an issue than my chest size. The even bigger challenge once it was on, was getting it off. Be warned- there is zero stretch to this fabric. I give it credit- it didn't rip even though I was pulling extremely hard in an attempt to rip it, because it wasn't going to come off any other way, due to no stretch and no zipper. I was by myself, and had the fleeting thought of going to my next door neighbor's house to have her pull it off of me. If I wasn't in a hurry to get out of the house I probably would have. And I don't even LIKE my next door neighbor. That's how desperate I was. I ended up having to literally cut it off of me. You think it's hard to take of a sports bra when you're sweaty? At least that has stretch, and if you're lucky you can pull it down your body rather than over your head. If you're within an inch of the measurements of the size chart, please size up. Otherwise, you'll end up wondering who you wronged in life to be trapped in such a cute top which you cannot escape without destroying it. Honestly it is super cute. I wish it didn't try to suffocate me. Two stars for cuteness. Negative 2304 stars for intent to kill. Read more
items.author: HeatherMT

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars nice dress but inconsistent sizing & fabric
items.body: for reference, i’m 5’3”, about 170lbs and wear a L/XL. i bought the dark green one (size L) in Oct. 2023 and it has held up well over the last 2 years. i bought the burgundy one in Oct. 2025 in the same size and the sizing is way off. the material is also different even though the listing shows it should be 100% dacron. the burgundy one is a heavier and stretchier fabric (the tag says it’s rayon, nylon, and spandex) while the green one is more light and definitely has no stretch. i still like both dresses and they are true to the color of the listing which i appreciate. overall a nice dress just beware it’s not consistent sizing or fabric! Read more
items.author: Jessica Shumaker

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Multi Red, Multicolored Geometry, Printed Plaid, Black, Striped Plaid, Leopard Khaki, Polka Dot Coffee, Geometry Orange, Polka Dot Black, Multicolored Plaid, Burgundy, Houndstooth, Navy Blue, Polka Dot Navy. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
